item.title: Lower mortgage rates may tempt home buyers. But these fast-rising phantom costs could sneak up on them.
item.description: Mortgage rates are down to a nearly three-month low. But if you’re thinking of buying a home, beware of these hidden costs.

item.title: Existing-home sales sag under weight of 7% mortgage rates in first month of 2025
item.description: Home buyers are still struggling with affordability, the National Association of Realtors said.
